.. currentmodule:: llrfgui

LLRF expert GUI
---------------

This expert GUI has been created using TaurusGUI as a main framework.
A set of specific widgets has been developed and included in the main GUI.

Everything has been package inside the llrfgui module.

llrfgui
-------
.. automodule:: llrfgui
   :members:

Content inside this module
--------------------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   Main GUI <llrfgui/main>
   Panels <llrfgui/panels>
   Commons <llrfgui/commons>
   Section chooser dialog <llrfgui/dialog>
